content:
User: Twist: Keep a raw archive. Save the full chat (thinking notes included) somewhere separate—like a debug log or a side folder. That way, if we need to dig into my process later (e.g., for Layer 0 or language tracking), it’s there, but it doesn’t slow down the main system now.

Grok: Tags Anyway: Even if we exclude them, tag my thinking notes (#GROK_THINKING_NOTES) and responses (#GROK_RESPONSE) in the raw chat. Makes it easy to preprocess out now and parse later if we flip the switch.
